mapper.sql: BuildingId, BuildingName, BuildingFinishTime, BuildingFloorArea, BuildingUsedArea, BuildingFloorCount, BuildingRegion, BuildingDescription, BuildingSupportFund
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from hs_building
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:

mapper.update:
update hs_building
BuildingId = #{record.buildingId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BuildingName = #{record.buildingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BuildingFinishTime = #{record.buildingFinishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BuildingFloorArea = #{record.buildingFloorArea,jdbcType=REAL},
BuildingUsedArea = #{record.buildingUsedArea,jdbcType=REAL},
BuildingFloorCount = #{record.buildingFloorCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BuildingRegion = #{record.buildingRegion,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BuildingDescription = #{record.buildingDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BuildingSupportFund = #{record.buildingSupportFund,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

update hs_building set BuildingId = #{record.buildingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BuildingName = #{record.buildingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BuildingFinishTime = #{record.buildingFinishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BuildingFloorArea = #{record.buildingFloorArea,jdbcType=REAL}, BuildingUsedArea = #{record.buildingUsedArea,jdbcType=REAL}, BuildingFloorCount = #{record.buildingFloorCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BuildingRegion = #{record.buildingRegion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BuildingDescription = #{record.buildingDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BuildingSupportFund = #{record.buildingSupportFund,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update hs_building
BuildingName = #{buildingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BuildingFinishTime = #{buildingFinishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BuildingFloorArea = #{buildingFloorArea,jdbcType=REAL},
BuildingUsedArea = #{buildingUsedArea,jdbcType=REAL},
BuildingFloorCount = #{buildingFloorCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BuildingRegion = #{buildingRegion,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BuildingDescription = #{buildingDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BuildingSupportFund = #{buildingSupportFund,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where BuildingId = #{buildingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
